tool_description: If you have forgotten the password of your PST file, you can retrieve the password of any Outlook version PST file using the Maildaddy PST Password Remover Tool. This tool allows you to recover passwords from large Outlook PST files without a 2GB size limit, making it easy to recover passwords in just a few clicks.

api_list.name: PST Password Remover
api_list.description: This API allows you to reset the password of an Outlook PST file using the MailsDaddy PST Password Recovery Tool. It can reset the password without requiring the old password and does so without damaging the data. The tool supports both ANSI and Unicode PST formats and is compatible with all MS Outlook versions including 2019, 2016, 2013, 2010, and 2007.
